BITSAT (Birla Institute of Technology an.Description: Admission test for integrated first-degree programs at BITS Pilani campuses.
BITSAT (Birla Institute of Technology an.Eligibility Criteria: 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics as core subjects.

Exam Details.Papers: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Logical Reasoning, and English Proficiency.
Exam Details.Pass Marks: Merit-based admission with cutoff scores for each BITS campus.

BITSAT (Birla Institute of Technology an.Participating Institutes: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS) campuses.

VIT Engineering Entrance Examination (VI.Description: Entrance test for admission to B.Tech programs at VIT Vellore and other campuses.
VIT Engineering Entrance Examination (VI.Eligibility Criteria: 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology, and English.

Exam Details.Pass Marks: Merit-based admission with rank in VITEEE.

SRMJEEE (SRM Joint Engineering Entrance.Description: Entrance test for admission to B.Tech programs at SRM University campuses.
SRMJEEE (SRM Joint Engineering Entrance.Eligibility Criteria: 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology, and English.

Exam Details.Papers: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology, English, and Aptitude.
Exam Details.Pass Marks: Merit-based admission with rank in SRMJEEE.

SRMJEEE (SRM Joint Engineering Entrance.Participating Institutes: SRM Institute of Science and Technology (SRMIST) campuses.

JEE Main (Joint Entrance Examination Mai.Description: A national-level exam for admission to undergraduate engineering programs in India.
JEE Main (Joint Entrance Examination Mai.Eligibility Criteria: 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics as core subjects.

Exam Details.Papers: Paper 1 (for B.E./B.Tech courses) and Paper 2 (for B.Arch/B.Planning courses)
Exam Details.Pass Marks: Varies by category and is determined through percentile scoring.

JEE Main (Joint Entrance Examination Mai.Participating Institutes: IITs, NITs, IIITs, CFTIs, and various state engineering colleges.

JEE Advanced (Joint Entrance Examination.Description: The next stage after JEE Main for admission to IITs for undergraduate engineering programs.
JEE Advanced (Joint Entrance Examination.Eligibility Criteria: Qualified in JEE Main and top 2,50,000 rank holders are eligible.

Exam Details.Papers: Two papers of Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
Exam Details.Pass Marks: Varies by category and is determined through scoring.
